text: Road Fools is the first extended play by Anybody Killa. Released in 2005, it peaked at number 23 on the Billboard Top Independent Albums chart. == Track listing == #"Intro" - 2:45 #"Feel This Way" - 4:19 #"Way We Roll" - 3:37 #"Up My Sleeve" 2:40 #"Are We There Yet?" - 3:26 #"Rage" (performed by the Krazy Klan) - 3:16 #"All-4-U" - 5:56 ==References== Category:2005 EPs Category:Anybody Killa EPs Category:Psychopathic Records EPs
title: Road Fools
